DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of (SEROQUEL SRâ„¢ ) quetiapine fumarate sustained-release (SR) compared to placebo in the treatment of anxiety symptoms in patients with generalized anxiety disorder (GAD). PLEASE NOTE: Seroquel SR and Seroquel XR refer to the same formulation. The SR designation was changed to XR after consultation with FDA.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Seroquel SR in the Treatment of Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged 18 to 65 years; A diagnosis of generalized anxiety disorder; Absence of current episode of major depression. The presence or history of schizophrenia and other psychotic disorders; Hypertension; A current diagnosis of cancer, unless in remission for at least 5 years
